data.eml:eml: New apterous Carventinae from Sri Lanka and Southern India (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Aradidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Heiss, Ernst, Baňař, Petr (2013): New apterous Carventinae from Sri Lanka and Southern India (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Aradidae). Zootaxa 3647 (3): 488-494, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3647.3.6
